name: panorama
description: Rotated device with panoramic screenshot support spanning multiple images

headline.description: Main marketing text (single mode only, ignored when slices > 1)

subheadline.description: Secondary text (single mode only, ignored when slices > 1)

theme.description: Color theme for background and text

layout.description: Position of headline relative to device (single mode only)

slices.description: Number of output images. Use 1 for single screenshot, 2+ for panorama mode.

headlines.description: Array of headlines, one per slice (panorama mode only, when slices > 1)

subheadlines.description: Array of subheadlines, one per slice (panorama mode only, when slices > 1)

single.description: Standard single screenshot mode with rotated device

panorama.description: Multi-slice panorama spanning multiple App Store images
